name: Slimeomancy
description: Slimeomancy is the ability to control and manipulate slime. In this puzzle game, you can do just that, in a way similiar to the old Lemmings games. Pixel by pixel, the slimes will march to their doom. It's up to you to solve each puzzle with problem solving and critical thinking. This indie game sports some retro 8-bit graphics that define the genre. Can you help the slimes fulfill their ultimate goal?
